All your library files, such as:

.so (Shared Object)
.so.3 (Shared Object version 3)
.a (Static Link Library, Import Link Library)

Need to go inside this folder, this folder is meant to build on Linux machines.

These files are not necessary to add for each platform, but must exist for one at least to include the third party library.

Once you add these files, you can remove this README.
